main event: A silvery glowing object was observed descending at a 45-degree angle before it disappeared behind trees in Savialle, New York.
interesting points: The object was described as round and the size of a half dollar., The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 seconds., The observer was sitting in an automobile when the object was first sighted., The report mentioned a subjective analysis aligning with meteor analysis., There was an indication of a possible reflection causing misinterpretation of the sighting.
